item.title: Canadians are going to the polls. Here’s the latest.
item.description: In the most important election of a generation, Canadians are heading to the polls Monday. Here’s what to know, and what to expect.

item.title: Major Power Outage Hits Spain, Portugal and France
item.description: The blackout affected millions of people and disrupted critical infrastructure such as train systems and traffic lights.
